interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nail Dip Powder Liquid Set with Base Activator and Top Coat, 10ml x 3, for Dipping Powder Manicure System, No Including Bond Primer Brush Saver, No Need UV/LED Lamp to Cured
Review Date: 2021/06/05
Store: unibouti
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Unibouti', 'Included Components': 'Top Coat, Dip Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 2.72 x 0.87 inches; 1.76 Ounces'}
Review Text: I love dip nails but these solutions are a mess. They glue themselves shut..the brush turns to concrete. ..and so on. I thought I would give these a go. I only dislike the base coat a bit, it doesn't seem as sticky as some others I have used. It's decent,  don't get me wrong, just mho. The activator is great, dries rock hard and the top coat settles smooth and shiny. They, so far, haven't glued themselves shut or turned to rock. We'll see how well they hold up.
Review Title: Decent top coat and strong activator
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Maniology (formerly bmc) Peel-able Temporary Short Wear Swatching Nail Lacquer Gel Polish Base Coat b.m.c {'Brand': 'B.m.c', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.1 x 1.1 x 2.6 inches', 'Item Weight': '0.05 Pounds', 'Product Dimensions': '1.1 x 1.1 x 2.6 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '708302916301'} Read reviews and thought this would be great. Not so for me. Clean release on some of my nail, and damaged the crap out of the lower 2/3. They looked like I had pried off acrylics. I nearly cried. I took a fine file to them, and the damage wasn't quite so bad, except for one nail. My left thumb was badly damaged. It took weeks to grow out the damage.
This, however, works ok with my teenagers nails, as she likes to peel off her nails if she gets bored (eeek) and this actually keeps her nails from being damaged. So, for her nails, its a 5, for mine, it was a 1, so I rated it thusly. Not impressed for me, works on others PUEEN 168 Nail Stamping Plates Synthetic Leather Holder Case Organizer in Blue Rose Lace Pattern-BH000006 PUEEN {} Use this with my bmc and other plates. I haven't had any issues with it. The front feels nice, I like the texture. Zipper works smooth. No obvious defects, sewing issues, etc. No nauseating smells when I got it. Plastic has a smooth feel to it that I like, doesn't feel cheap. Holds plates pretty well. Turn it upside down and shake it, yeah, you get some slipping. I haven't had any slide out, and I've accidentally carried it around upside down quite a lot, dropped it and in one stunning display of clumsiness - I managed to drop it, then kick it across the room, picked it up only to drop it from chest high. Sigh. And all the plates were STILL in place, and this thing is holding up quite well. Really happy with it. Recommend! I love it, works great with my plates b.m.c by Bundle Monster 20pc Nail Art Image Manicure Stamping Plates-CYO 2 Collection HealthMarket ['Bundle Monster 20pc Nail Art Image Manicure Stamping Plates-2014 CYO Collection'] {'Product Dimensions': '2.2 x 2.2 x 0.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '701233192271', 'Manufacturer': 'HealthMarket'} These are the stamping plates that I use all the time. I stamp over gel nail polish with konad stamping polish, Essie polish, or Sallie Hanson insta-dri polish. When you first pull off the blue protective film, clean the plates really well with acetone. Then, I usually paint, scrape, roll, and then clean everything off without actually rolling the first stamping on my nails. I find the first stamping doesn't go well on a fresh plate, so I just don't waste my time.
After doing that, they stamp fine all the time. I have found at least one image in every stamper bundle that has stamping issues. I just don't use that stamp. These plates have intricate designs that transfer well. If you find that not all of your design is trasferring, first clean the plate really well with acetone. All that built-up dried polish affects the stamp. There are lots of good videos on stamping troubleshooting, too, if you are having trouble.
I stamp with a konad stamper, and scrape with an old credit card or empty gift cards. Metal scrapers will damage the plates. My go-to stampers Blackhead Extractor, Comedone Extractor & Blemish Remover Kit - 7 Professional Surgical Quality Tools including FREE Dentist's Mirror by Pristine Essentials + Complementary Ebook Pristine Essentials ['Safe and Effective Extraction for Flawless Beautiful Skin You Deserve', 'Get Clean, Clear and Beautiful Skin Now! Do you have blackheads, whiteheads, pimples on you face? Are you sick of the blemishes on your skin? Do you wish to have clean and clear skin?', 'Primary Instruments for acne extraction', "Use these convenient tools to relieve your complexion by effectively extracting black and white heads. This hygienic tool kit will not leave marks or scars when used properly. The lance delicately pierces white heads when necessary and both parts of the tool can be used on face and body. These tools feature a small loop for white heads and a flat side to extract blackheads. The tools are designed with a pretty slate finish and the handle fits comfortably in the hand for ease and accuracy. The angled wire end glides over whiteheads to release debris from the pore. The opposite side's long, flat loop is designed to gently press out blackheads. 100% satisfaction guaranteed or your money back no questions asked! We cannot guarantee this SPECIAL PRICE, So be sure to add to your cart.", 'Tips', ": You should never push too hard on a blackhead. A deep, cystic pimple should not be opened with a loop extractor. When dealing with deep acne, it's best to visit a dermatologist.", 'TO MAKE THE DEAL EVEN BETTER WE HAVE INCLUDED A FREE EBOOK WITH TIPS ABOUT HOW TO CARE FOR YOUR SKIN'] {'Brand': 'Pristine Essentials', 'Item Form': 'Needle', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Skin Type': 'acne prone', 'Item Weight': '137 Grams', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 2.4 x 1.1 inches; 4.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437950770', 'Manufacturer': 'Pristine Essentials'} I have had a single tool for years. When I got the opportunity to review this product at a reduced price, I was pretty excited.
It comes with several tools. There are many different sizes to choose from, based on the size of the whitehead you are removing. The lancet is sharp enough to work without being dangerously sharp.
Besides being useful just for blackhead, whitehead or small cysts, these are also pretty useful with splinters and ingrown hairs. Comes with sterilization instructions and a very nice zippered pouch. Great for face and body Straight 13x4 Lace Front Wigs Burgundy Lace Front Wigs Long Bob Synthetic Ombre Wine Red Wig Pre-plucked with Baby Hair Free Part Heat Resistant Synthetic Lace Wigs for Women 20 Inch NOBLE {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'NOBLE', 'Package Dimensions': '13.74 x 7.87 x 2.2 inches; 12.63 Ounces'} First off, I couldn't get this wig on fully. I adjusted it as much as I could and still it didn't lay right. Apparently, I have a huge head.

Besides that, I really was impressed with the quality. It came with the wig cap, a nice box, and false lashes. The quality is pretty darn impressive for the size. It looks and feels like real hair. Its really cute. I am pretty disappointed tjat my huge noggin keeps me from wearing it.

Absolutely recommend for normal heads 😉 Nice wig, amazing quality for price Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Natwag {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} I was pretty hesitant on these. I mean, my microfiber cleaning cloths are kinda rough and definitely not something I want to put on my skin. However, these are soft like a dream cloud.

They do come with a laundry bag but I washed by hand.

I washed one side of my face with a washcloth and the other with these. Then I swiped micellar water over each side. The microfiber side had a tiny bit of makeup residue. The washcloth side had waaaay more. I was pretty stunned.
I now only use these for makeup removal. And I definitely recommend 😊 So soft and great clean Nail Dip Powder Liquid Set with Base Activator and Top Coat, 10ml x 3, for Dipping Powder Manicure System, No Including Bond Primer Brush Saver, No Need UV/LED Lamp to Cured unibouti {'Brand': 'Unibouti', 'Included Components': 'Top Coat, Dip Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 2.72 x 0.87 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} I love dip nails but these solutions are a mess. They glue themselves shut..the brush turns to concrete. ..and so on. I thought I would give these a go. I only dislike the base coat a bit, it doesn't seem as sticky as some others I have used. It's decent, don't get me wrong, just mho. The activator is great, dries rock hard and the top coat settles smooth and shiny. They, so far, haven't glued themselves shut or turned to rock. We'll see how well they hold up. Decent top coat and strong activator
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user maintains a strong focus on beauty and personal care products, particularly in nail care and skin care tools. Their recent experience with a dip nail product suggests an ongoing interest in nail enhancements and a desire for reliable at-home manicure solutions.

- **Experience Variability:** Their interactions continue to reflect a balanced evaluation of product effectiveness, blending personal usage with insights gathered from communal experiences. This dual approach is especially evident in their assessments of nail care products.

- **Sensitivity to Damage:** The user remains vigilant about skin and nail health. Their recent product evaluation reveals a commitment to finding solutions that are both effective and safe, without compromising the integrity of their nails.

- **Family Usage Consideration:** The user's assessments remain inclusive, considering the suitability of products for various family members. This focus indicates a desire for products that can be enjoyed across different ages and preferences.

- **Balanced Rating System:** The user's dual-rating system persists, emphasizing their thoughtful approach to evaluations based on both personal and familial experiences.

- **Rating Influence:** Individual product effectiveness is key to their overall satisfaction, as evidenced by their detailed review. Their ongoing commitment to performance, safety, and family-friendly qualities continues to shape their beauty and personal care journeys.

Overall, the user demonstrates a discerning adaptability in their beauty regimen, consistently prioritizing effectiveness, safety, and shared usability in their selection of products.
